meanings.sent1: She felt unvexed when she realized her mistake was easily fixable.
meanings.sent2: The unvexed cat napped peacefully in the sun.
meanings.sent3: Even the unvexed squirrel seemed to be laughing at the chaos in the park.
meanings.sent4: His unvexed demeanor in the face of chaos was admirable.
meanings.sent5: The unvexed lake reflected the clear blue sky perfectly.

meanings.sent4: Her unvexed voice calmed everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: The unvexed atmosphere of the party put everyone at ease.
